alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 31 at 12:30PM EDT until September 02 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Withlacoochee River above Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd) affecting Brooks and Lowndes Counties. For the Withlacoochee River...including Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd), Quitman (US 84), Pinetta (CR 150)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Withlacoochee River above Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd). * WHEN...From Friday evening to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 127.5 feet, The river rises out of the bank near the Lowndes and Cook County line. At 135.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. Langdale Park floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 132.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 135.1 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 135.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 135.7 feet on 08/06/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 630 AM EDT.
